Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Initial Android release: secure connection, no signup, unlimited bandwidth.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: Android 8.0+ (minSdk 26); targetSdk 36; Internet connection; Supported ABIs: arm64-v8a, armeabi-v7a, x86, x86_64; Package: free.vpn.proxy.mars.

English.Keywords: mars vpn, free vpn mars, freevpnmars, free vpn, android vpn, secure vpn, fast vpn, unlimited vpn, no logs vpn
English.Char_Desc_45: Free VPN for Android — no limits.
English.Char_Desc_80: Fast, secure free Android VPN — no sign-up, no logs, unlimited speed.
English.Char_Desc_250: Mars VPN gives you private, unrestricted access on Android with no accounts, no hidden fees, and no data or speed limits. Connect in one tap and browse freely with stable performance and smart server selection.
English.Char_Desc_450: Enjoy a lightweight, user-friendly VPN built for everyday use. Mars VPN secures your connection, hides your IP, and lets you stream, message, and surf without restrictions. No registration required, no logs collected, and unlimited bandwidth for smooth performance with auto-connect to the optimal server.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Mars VPN is a free Android VPN designed for privacy, speed, and simplicity. Get instant protection and access to your favorite sites and apps with one tap — no account creation, no trials, and no hidden fees. The app offers unlimited bandwidth and stable performance so you can stream, chat, and browse without slowdowns. A clean interface and auto-connect help you get online fast while automatically choosing an optimal server for you. Mars VPN focuses on user privacy and transparency, providing a secure connection and an experience tailored for everyday use on Android devices. Use it to keep your traffic private on public Wi‑Fi, reduce tracking, and enjoy open access across social media, messaging, and streaming platforms.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: This agreement is between customer and freevpnmars.com (Free VPN Unlimited AG, Rigistrasse 3, CH-6300 Zug, Switzerland) regarding VPN-service, related services and functions. This service is NOT intended to assist in the commission of unlawful acts. It is a service that provides anonymity and privacy. You agree not to violate any laws of your country or the one where you are currently. For binding terms, please refer to the EULA and Privacy Policy available on the official website.
